content: this pattern was the mkal for march 2023 i make mittens /groups/i-make-mittens this pattern is a stranded colourwork mitten which works best with contrasting solid or tonal yarns it is written for one size but it is possible to make it smaller or larger by adjusting your needle size yarn approximately 50g of main colour fingering weight yarn and approximately 30g of contrast colour fingering weight yarn there is an option to use approximately 20g of a third contrasting colour
